name: Iridescent Haze
description:
Iridescent Haze is a trippy dungeon crawler that has you,  the famous rockstar Joan, trying to get home after one of the best gigs of your life. However, Joan is currently drunk and high and everything is a mix of smoke and mirrors.

Will Joan be able to deal with the adoring fans, even though they're not performing naymore? Will they navigate their way out of the bar? Will they be able to find the damn bathroom?!Content warning: drug use, alcohol use and course language.

Controls:

WASD or Arrow Keys - Move
A,S,D - Rock out!
Spacebar - Interact with Mirros
ESC - Pause

This project was made for Dungeon Crawler Jam 2023!


TEAM!
Designer: Noah Rapetti
Art: Piroporopi
Programming: SunnySideUp, Clive Patrick,Brian Burns
Music/Sound design: Dom Parker
Guitarist: Charlie
Voice actor: Abby Schriber
